::KitKat::

She smiled at him. "I hope so."  she hugged him and walked into her 
room.  Closed and locked the door behind them.

(KitKat will leave her room later on in a very happy mood.)


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit headed to KitKat's room, alongside her.
> "I think I'll find out. One way, or another." He said kissing her
> deeply. He hadn't been in much contack with her, since the Rowdy
> incodent. He intended to make the most out of tonight.
